Name: MERN
Description: JavaScript-based stack for single-page applications.

Name: React/Django
Description: Combines React's dynamic front-end with Django's robust back-end.
UseCases: Full-stack web applications requiring rapid development and scalability.

Name: Django/FastAPI
Description: Python-based frameworks for building web applications and APIs.
UseCases: Backend services requiring high performance and scalability.

Name: MEVN
Description: JavaScript stack with Vue.js for the front end.
TypicalUseCases: Web apps with rich UI, Medium-scale projects

Name: Next.js/Node.js
Description: React-based framework with server-side rendering and Node.js backend.
UseCases: Full-stack applications with server-side rendering for improved performance.

Name: Spring Boot/React.js
Description: Java-based backend framework with React.js front-end library.
UseCases: Enterprise-level applications requiring robust backend and dynamic front-end.

Name: Flutter
Description: Google's UI toolkit for natively compiled applications.

Name: React Native
Description: Framework for building native apps using React.
UseCases: Mobile applications for iOS and Android.

Name: Swift/SwiftUI
Description: Apple's native framework for iOS development.
UseCases: iOS applications with modern UI frameworks.

Name: LAMP
Description: Traditional stack for dynamic websites and web apps.

Name: LEMP
Description: Alternative to LAMP using Nginx.

Name: ASP.NET/Angular
Description: Microsoft’s backend combined with Google's front-end framework.
UseCases: Enterprise web applications requiring security and scalability.

Name: Drupal
Description: Flexible CMS for complex websites.

Name: WordPress
Description: Popular CMS for websites and blogs.

Name: Enonic XP
Description: Open-source web application platform and CMS.

Name: Ruby on Rails
Description: Previously popular for web development, now declining.
UseCases: Web applications with an MVC architecture.

Name: MEAN
Description: Full-stack JavaScript framework for dynamic web apps.

Name: PERN
Description: Combines PostgreSQL with the MERN stack.

Name: Xamarin
Description: Microsoft's framework for cross-platform mobile apps.

Name: Kotlin Multiplatform
Description: Google's Android development language with native iOS support.
UseCases: Cross-platform mobile apps with native experience.

Name: Native Android
Description: Standard Android app development stack.
UseCases: Android apps that require full native performance.

Name: Native iOS
Description: Traditional iOS app development stack.
UseCases: iOS applications requiring full system integration.
TypicalUseCases: iOS apps with full system control

Name: Ionic
Description: Hybrid mobile framework for web technologies.
UseCases: Mobile apps with web-based UI components.
TypicalUseCases: Mobile apps built with web technologies

Name: JHipster
Description: Application generator for modern web apps.

Name: ASP.NET Stack
Description: Microsoft's stack for web applications.

Name: Symfony
Description: Enterprise-grade web framework for scalable applications.

Name: Laravel
Description: PHP framework for rapid development and SaaS apps.
